review: Dr.(Maj) Subhashish Halder is a very humble soft spoken and professionally challenged dentist. His efficiency is remarkable.He is treating my whole family since more than 10 years.I strongly recommend him for any type of complication ralated to teeth and wish him success in this profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Halder is a thorough professional. He explains everything clearly, is never in a rush and does not stop until he is completely sure that the treatment will last. I strongly recommend him to anyone looking for dental treatment.
Faraaz
